Description:
Dream Westernport site
Shift your lifestyle into a relaxed gear near Westernport Bay with a fantastic sized block of land in the tranquil township of Bittern. Measuring at a generous 803sqm (approx) this flat site offers space to craft the home of your dreams (STCA) in a quiet community within easy reach of the beach, Hastings, boating, reserves and some of the Peninsula's finest wineries.
- Less than 10 minutes' drive to Balnarring Beach
- Peaceful semi-rural surrounds
- Walk to Graham Myers Reserve, near Bittern Primary School
- 2 minute drive to the Bittern shops and Bittern Station
- 5 minutes to Balnarring Village Shopping Centre
- Private position, set back from Hendersons Road
- Cleared and ready to go!

Description:
LUXURY VILLA IN THE HEART OF BITTERN!
Expression of interest is required for this Luxury Villa in Bittern.
3 Bedrooms, the main with large walk in robe and ensuite
Fans throughout the home
Kitchen with quality stainless steele appliances, Bosch dishwasher, induction cooktop and wall oven
Ducted heating and x 2 reverse cycle air conditioners
Retractable blinds giving outdoor comfort all year round
Magnificent landscape garden and Outside undercover alfresco area with timber decking
Double garage
This location provides close access to Bittern Fields Shops with bus and train only 50 metres distance. All this at your convenience! \ Part furnisher for sale \
Inspection by appointment.

Description:
Town jewel on 700sqm
A celebration of space and modern style on 700sqm (approx) of land just 200m to the shops and Bittern Station, this extensively renovated home hits the mark for relaxed coastal living. Families will love the easy walk to school, the supermarket and pre-school, while those slowing down will savour the tranquillity and the accessible boating in this laid-back Western Port township.
- Subdividable-sized block (STCA) 2 mins walk to Bitternfields Shopping Centre
- Freshly renovated home with new flooring, window furnishings and more
- Stone kitchen with brand new ovens, built-in microwave and gas cooktop
- Fresh bedrooms with built-in robes; renovated ensuite and family bathroom
- Floating Blackbutt timber floorboards, European laundry with appliances
- Large covered alfresco terrace with sandstone pavers and servery windows
- Flat and private, grassy back yard with 2 garden sheds and fire pit area
- Split system heating/cooling, remote single garage with rear access
In response to COVID-19 and Melbourne Metro (including the Mornington Peninsula area) entering Stage 4 restrictions, all public open homes and private inspections have been suspended until further notice. All enquiry is still invited and our Team can be contacted for information and advice at any time.

Description:
Stunning Family Home
169 WOOLLEYS ROAD, BITTERN
Designed with purpose and precision, this beautiful family abode seamlessly blends timeless charm and art-deco living on 1170 sqm approx. A serene interior palette is enhanced by stunning timber floors and picture cornices to artfully display your favourite pieces, while a delightful front sitting room basks in the ambient glow of an open fireplace.
This beautiful abode encapsulates everything desired in a family home;
~ Featuring 4 spacious bedrooms, plus a study; master bedroom with hand-crafted cabinetry and stylish counter top hand basin.
~ The pièce de resistance, a custom boutique kitchen with stainless steel appliances, ornamental combustion cooker, breakfast bar and industrial pendant lights.
~ Double glass doors create a seamless connection with the rear veranda and superb decked outdoor entertaining area perfect for upcoming summer nights gathered around the fire pit.
~ Beautiful manicured gardens provide the perfect sanctuary amongst fruit trees and raised vegetable beds.
~ Further features include; split system air-conditioning in main living area, double carport, workshop and garden shed/art studio.
Arguably one of the finest and highly sought after locations in Bittern, with close proximity to the Village and public transport, this enchanting home offers its new owners an unparalleled private oasis to enjoy with family and friends.
Disclaimer: Whilst every effort has been made to ensure the accuracy and thoroughness of the information provided to you in our marketing material, we cannot guarantee the accuracy of the information provided by our Vendors and as such C & G Realestate makes no statement, representation or warranty and assumes no legal liability in relation to the accuracy of the information provided. Interested parties should conduct their own due diligence in relation to each property they are considering purchasing. All photographs, maps and images are representative only for marketing purposes.

Description:
The Ultimate Family Package!
This contemporary single level home was designed with entertainment in mind, creating a luxurious retreat for the family to all enjoy. Complete to the highest standards, located in a very sought after area and set on a generous parcel of land, being just under 1 acre (approx), this impressive home is it's own private sanctuary.
~ A choice of living areas keeps the family happy, offering an inviting formal living room, huge open plan family meals area plus a rumpus/games room.
~Stunning kitchen well equipped with quality appliances, Caesarstone benches, large Island bench with breakfast bar plus walk in pantry.
~ A delightful master bedroom is placed peacefully away from the rest of the bedrooms and complete with deluxe ensuite with semi frameless shower, spa bath, double basins and WC plus a large walk in robe.
~ 3 further carpeted bedrooms all with built in robes, in addition a separate large office providing the perfect set up to work from home.
~ The family bathroom is centrally located and provides large frameless shower, separate bath, vanity with an adjoining powder room.
~ At the rear of the home you are spoilt with having the ultimate outdoor entertaining zone with undercover alfresco area complete with exposed aggregate and café blinds making all year entertaining a breeze. Fenced swim spa area which overlooks the paved patio area and manicured garden surrounds. In additional there is a large shed positioned at the rear of the block which has direct access from the front with an additional entrance making it ideal for trailer, boat, caravan storage.
~ Further modern features of the home included, ducted heating, wood heater, refrigerated cooling, ceiling fans in all bedrooms, water tanks, double remote lock up garage with fitted work bench, along with further off street parking.
Ideally located within close proximity of Bittern Primary school, the shops and public transport, this home certainly provides for all your daily essentials.
Please contact Lisa Roberts on 0488 910 368 or email lisa@robertsandgreen.com.au to arrange a private inspection of this property.

Description:
Perfectly Positioned Townhouse!
Conveniently located within walking distance to Bittern train station, Bittern village and other public transport. This townhouse will delight the first home buyer, downsizer or astute investor.
Benefits include:
- Master bedroom, living room and kitchen downstairs
- Large central living zone
- Modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, stone benchtops and glass splash backs
- Great outdoor entertaining space with two covered pergola/BBQ areas and a lovely water feature
Upstairs you will find a further two bedrooms with a walk-through bathroom and a study nook for added versatility.
Complete with ducted heating, ducted cooling, alarm system and a double lock up garage (with remote door), this property is not only pleasing to the eye, but also extremely practical.
For more information, please to not hesitate to call Jason Dowler at any time.

Description:
Easy Style For Easy Living
This simple and modern 5 Bedroom home offers all you could want and more, with an excellent location and ample room for growing or established families, it is an excellent opportunity to obtain a prime piece of peninsula real estate!
As you enter, you'll be greeted by the separate main living zone, which leads to an open plan kitchen meals area with stone benches, dishwasher, stainless steel appliances, ample storage and timber floorboards throughout.
Offering ample bedrooms with built in robes and including a master with ensuite, a further two bathrooms and laundry, the home offers space for everyone! One of the other great features of the home would have to be the enclosed rumpus/games or recreational room located at the rear of the home!
The modern conveniences continue with various heating and cooling options such as split system heating cooling/ air conditioning and other gas varieties of heating to accommodate the multiple living zones. Outdoor features lovely low maintenance landscaping and lawns.
A newly built brick double garage will be included in the sale.
Located in a well sort after pocket of Bittern, the home is walking distance to local shops, schools, only minutes' drive to the Peninsula's leading beaches, wineries & more.
***Please note that there is a pending boundary to be created which will divide 56 and 56A Myers Road with a common or shared driveway, as this property has been subdivided and 56A Myers Road will not be included in this sale.

Description:
Defining family living
Upon entering you will be captivated by the large entrance and hallway that leads to the living area which comprises half of the ground floor that is flooded with natural light and can easily accommodate family gatherings.
The sophisticated kitchen design is both beautiful and functional, it will be the envy of your friends with expansive stone benches and an engineered stone diner -style brunch area or prep area. Abundants of cupboard space, upright stove, stainless steel dishwasher, stone double sink and stone splash back finishes off the beautiful designed kitchen which adjoins a large social living area that also overlooks the outdoor area and inground pool and backyard. There is also a formal/ informal dining area, pool room or second living area, powder room for the guests and study or fifth bedroom.
The spiral staircase will lead you to the first floor, here is where the bedrooms are zoned with a third living area. The master bedroom has indulgent space, ensuite with spa and double shower, it also boasts a walk in dresser and ample built in robes. The other 3 bedrooms are all double sized and have BIR's. The main bathroom has bath, shower and vanity for the children.
The floor coverings are a balance of timber floating floor and brand new wool carpet.
Here is a home of approximately 40sq with a triple car garage under roofline is designed to welcome the busy families. A low maintenance 700sqmt allotment jammed with everything a family wants. The sweeping outdoor area overlooks the very large inground swimming pool which is solar heated that the family will enjoy while you sit back and relax in the covered outdoor area that allows room for nestling as well as dinning. Solar panels to reduce your power bill and surrounded by a easy care garden.
Please contact Wilme Green on 0407 833 996 or email wilma@robertsandgreen.com.au to arrange a private inspection of this property.

Description:
Under Offer
Here is an opportunity to buy in a sought after location along with a quality home with the village only minutes walk away. Boasting a high end finish, ideal floorplan, space and privacy, makes this Bittern gem well suited to all families, retirees, professionals, sea & tree changers.
Comprising: 4 bedrooms with large ensuite and walk in robe off master, open plan kitchen, meals and lounge, study, formal lounge, formal dining, rumpus/theatre room, central bathroom, covered alfresco, double car garage and a large shed. Special features include: plantation shutters, stone benches, bitumen driveway, solar, loads of natural light, expansive deck, gas ducted heating, reverse cycle air con, chook pen and vegetable garden beds. Fruit trees include: walnut, almond, mandarin, apricot, apple, pear, peach and lime.
Close to Bittern village and train station, Bittern Primary, the regions leading beaches and wineries and a short drive to down via Peninsula Link

Description:
Traditional Yester Year Dream California Bungalow
This unique and brilliantly positioned Californian bungalow is set high on a large allotment of approx 929m2 in a quiet end of the street with leafy surrounds and within stones throw to the park.
Some styles are always in demand, some settings are constantly sought after - both these tick the boxes when you take a visit to this home which features:
~ The classical elegance of the entrance hall sets the tone for refined, home of yester year.
~ The focal point of the living room is the fireplace which is complimented with an abundance of natural light creating beautiful warmth all year round. The living room opens through to a separate dining room, which adjoins a very functional kitchen showcasing large island bench and all the modern appliances.
~ You don't have to look too closely to notice the original ornate ceiling and cornices, sash windows and stained lead lighting that is scattered throughout the interior of the home.
~ Stunning Baltic flooring throughout sets the character of the home within.
~ Three generous sized robed bedrooms along with 3 defined living areas.
The effect, inside and out, is irresistible. You will be captivated by the back outdoor area which is lit up with fairy lights where you can sit back and relax looking out to the serene gardens or unwind out on the front verandah which features timber balustrade, brick pillars and overlooks the many species of fruit trees and vegie garden.
~ Further features include 20,000 litre underground water tank and solar panels.
This home continues to make a huge impression for the traditional yester year feel and to this day remains a favourite for families, so take this opportunity to make it yours.
This home is for auction however we invite offers prior too.
Please contact Wilma Green on 0407 833 996 or email wilma@robertsandgreen.com.au to arrange a private inspection of this property.
Please click through the below link to view our terms and conditions for all inspections.

Description:
History, Character and Charm
A timeless two-bedroom cottage set amongst a vast array of gardens and paddocks on approximately 1.01hectares (10,100sqm), offering the highly sought-after combination of space and functionality. Maintaining a sense of seclusion yet only moments from the beaches of Balnarring and Somers, cafes, schools and transport, this charming abode combines convenience with a sense of history, privacy and tranquillity.
~ Adorned with high ceilings, sash windows and timber flooring throughout main living areas with the added comfort of carpeted bedrooms.
~ Formal living area with ceiling fan, ensuring a comfortable space for the family to come together at the end of a busy day.
~ Master bedroom is complete with a built-in robe and ceiling fan for year round comfort.
~ Spacious second bedroom.
~ An added bonus is the detached studio, complete with power which can be utilised as a third bedroom.
~ Central bathroom boasting a claw foot bathtub.
~ The country-inspired kitchen features a built-in oven, gas 5-burner cook-top, Bosch dishwasher and ample storage as well as a stunning timber bench top; and opens out to the large undercover entertaining area, overlooking the sprawling landscape.
~ Space-saving European laundry.
~ The backyard features a large chicken coop, several vegetable gardens, 3 year old orchard, dam and boasts plenty of space for the children to explore the surroundings that are on offer.
~ Adding to the functionality is the facility of water to the paddocks, allowing adequate care of the entire space.
~ Large barn style shed complete with concrete floor, offers an abundance of storage for boats, trailers and caravans as well as additional 9x9 shed with power and water.
You can follow this property on instagram @whitecottageacreage
Please contact Lisa Roberts on 0488 910 368 or email lisa@robertsandgreen.com.au to arrange a private inspection of this property.
Please click through the below link to view our terms and conditions for all inspections.
https://robertsandgreen.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Terms-and-Condition-for-Private-Inspections.pdf

Description:
Pure Indulgence - Striking Masterpiece On 5 Acres (approx)
Packed with luxury extras and the latest technology for a life of comfort, this gracious and charming five-bedroom residence comes complete with five fenced paddocks, a stable complex with hot wash and a great training arena for equestrian enthusiasts.
A stunning statement of peace & tranquillity. This lovingly maintained family oasis in a tightly held & desired location presents an astonishing amount of space to relax, retreat & entertain with ease.
Proudly Boasting:
- Quiet 'no through road' location
- Granite kitchen with European appliances and a walk-in pantry
- Two luxurious master suites upstairs with modern ensuites, one with a decked area and an amazing outlook over the grounds
- C-Bus home automation, StarServe networking
- Bore to ensure the lake is always looking its best and for irrigation of the grounds
- Large entertaining space with deck, built in swim spa and bar/ billiard room with bathroom facilities
- Your very own golf hole complete with putting green
- Green house perfect for cultivating fruit, vegetables or flowers
Additional features include gas feature fire, three zone ducted heating, refrigerated air conditioning, ducted vacuum, electric fencing, remote entrance gates and a lovely lake with BBQ house and jetty.
This property is certain to appeal to families looking for the balance of a rural lifestyle whilst being in close proximity to schools, public transport and all desired amenities.
The overall property includes so many delights and surprises that an inspection is a must! Don't miss out on one of the rarest and most exciting opportunities on the market today!

Description:
Privacy Plus.
Here is a rare gem with unrivalled privacy and an excellent outdoor entertaining area. Situated at the end of a battle axe driveway with great access for caravan or boat storage makes the home well suited to all families, retirees, people downsizing from larger land, tradies in need off ample off street parking and anyone after that ideal place to call home.
Comprising: 4 bedrooms with ensuite and walk in robe off the master, wide central hallway, open plan kitchen, meals and lounge, central bathroom, separate toilet, laundry, undercover entertaining, sundrenched yard, shed with adjoining carport and a double car garage. All of this along with quality finishes, stone bench tops, exposed aggregate, elaborate pet enclosure, gas fire place and heating and cooling.
Close to Bittern Train Station, all the amenities at the village, Lorna's Triangle Bushland Reserve, Bittern Primary, Balnarring village and an easy drive to town via Peninsula Link.

Description:
Heres a wonderful place to call home, 3 bedrooms, 2 Bathroom residence in a small group.
Set back well off the road and with a fabulous position in this small group of 6, this 3 bedroom well-designed townhouse has a perfect layout to catch all the morning sun and makes for easy living inside and out.
The open plan living / dining which is tiled throughout flows out to the paved courtyard while the kitchen that features stainless steel appliances, breakfast bar and stone benchtops provides all the things youll need for cooking up a storm or entertaining.
The main bedroom is finished with a well-appointed ensuite in neutral colour tones and a walk-in robe and the other two additional bedrooms both have robes. Theres a family bathroom with both shower and bath and separate powder room that will make it handy when the guests and family are staying over.
From the double garage you have direct access to the home and to the rear courtyard that will add to the security and your piece of mind.
Within easy walk of the bus, train and village this well-appointed 3 bedroom town house will surely please the discerning buyer.
Features include:
* Open plan living with sliding doors to courtyard
* 3 bedrooms with robes and main bedroom with ensuite
* Modern kitchen with stainless steel cooking & dishwasher
* Ducted gas heating and split system air conditioning
* Double garage and garden shed
* Land size 208m2

Description:
Tucked Away & Secure. 2 Acres approx
Tucked away in a secluded location in a rural setting, we proudly present this immaculately renovated property that is sure to impress.
Horse enthusiasts, hobby farmers and those just wanting a change will be drawn to this property. This 4 bedroom home offers multiple living areas with separate dining and lounge, open plan living, dining and Kitchen.
The kitchen features granite benchtops,dishwasher, gas cooktop and oven. With 3 spacious bedrooms offering built in robes.Additional features also include studio/teenager retreat, coonara, ducted heating, 2 x reverse cycle split systems. solar panels help the power costs.
Outside is where you can truly enjoy this magnificent property, including a large entertaining area, large shed for tradies or car enthusiasts who need secure storage or plenty of workshop space, shedding has solar heating the pool. Additional features include return driveway with ample amounts of parking and water tank - 6500L approx.
Enjoy the seclusion and tranquility of this stunning lifestyle property while enjoying close proximity to all Bittern has to offer, including large shopping
centre, close to trains,and bus/transport - whilst remaining only a short drive to local beaches, renowned local wineries and all the best of the Mornington Peninsula.
Inspection Contact Don McKenzie
